transcript: When I was just a little baby boy my mama used to tell me these crazy things She used to tell me my daddy was an evil man, she used to tell me he hated me But then I got a little bit older and I realized she was the crazy one But there was nothing I could do or say to try to change it cause that's just the way she was They said I can't rap about being broke no more They say I can't rap about coke no more Slut, you think I won't choke no more till the vocal cords don't work in the throat no more...
